name: Haus Tiefenbrunner
description: We are located in the village of Leutasch moss in a very quiet, sunny and central location (only ca.5 minutes drive from the center Weidach away) and are an ideal starting point for numerous hiking, biking and lodge tours. The entry into the cross-country ski trail is located directly in front of the house. 4 apartments with a cozy newly setup for 2-4, 2-5 and 4-8 people. Also can you expect from us: A lawn with deck chairs for free (summer); A small wellness area with a beautiful fish pond (summer); Introduction to the trail in front of our house (winter); Heated ski (winter); Reduced in the indoor pool and sauna in Leutasch; Free Toboggan hire (winter); Free Bike Rental (summer);
Includes: heating, water, electricity Exclusive: Final cleaning (Whng. 2-4 pers., € 26, -; Whng. 4-8 pers., € 30, -) Local tax € 1.20.

From the north via toll-free Garmisch Partenkirchen + 35 km, Mittenwald, Unterleutasch, alley, Kirchplatzl to Ortsteil moss. Car: From the East Highway A12/Ausfahrt Zirl East + 12 km From the West Highway A12/Ausfahrt Telfs Ost + 12 km Rail: Karwendel Bahn Innsbruck - Garmisch; Plane: Munich 138 km, Innsbruck 21 km, Zurich 300 km.

makesOffer.name: Apartment with shower, toilet and 1 bed room.
makesOffer.description: A 2 room apartment (deer) in the 55m² for the second floor, 2-5 persons. Equipped comfortably equipped with shower / WC, 1 bedroom, living room with kitchen (microwave, dishes, etc.) and sleeping facilities, a cloakroom. Also satellite TV, radio, bath-hand dish towels and bedclothes are available. South-facing balcony with stunning panoramic views.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description: A 2 room apartment (rabbit) in the first floor 53m² for 2-4 persons. Equipped comfortably equipped with shower, separate WC, 1 bedroom, living room with sleeping facilities, kitchen (Microwave, dishes, etc.), wardrobe. Also satellite TV, radio, bath-hand dish towels and bedclothes are available. East and south-facing terrace, with magnificent panoramic view.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description:
A 2 room apartment (Fox) in the slightly sunken floor 45m² for 2-4 persons. Equipped comfortably equipped with shower / WC, 1 bedroom, living room with sleeping accommodation, kitchen (microwave, dishes, etc.) wardrobe. This apartment is also very bright and with a clear view outside. 
Also satellite TV, radio, bath-hand dish towels and bedclothes are available. East and south-facing terrace, with magnificent panoramic view.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower and bath, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
A 4 room apartment (squirrel) in the second floor 65m² for 4-8 persons. 
Equipped with very comfortable en-suite bathroom (bath, shower, 
Double washbasin and toilet), 
2 bedrooms, 1 nursery, living room with kitchen (microwave, dishes, etc.) and sleeping facilities, a cloakroom. 
Also satellite TV, radio, bath-hand dish towels and bedclothes are available. 
South and east, with a magnificent panoramic view.
